mapper.select:
SELECT t.ID id, t.CODE code, t.DISPLAY_NAME displayName, t.LOGIN_NAME loginName, t.PASSWORD password, t.SEX sex, t.KIND kind, t.DUTY_ID dutyId, t.LEVEL level, t.DEPT_ID deptId, t.STATUS status, t.ENTRY_DATE entryDate, t.LEADER_ID leaderId, t.DEPT_LEADER deptLeader, t.CHARGE_LEADER chargeLeader, t.POLITICAL political, t.CARD_NO cardNo, t.WEIGHT weight, t.ORDER_NO orderNo, t.JOB_TITLE jobTitle, t.PHOTO photo, t.MOBILE mobile, t.OFFICE_TEL officeTel, t.EMAIL email, t.ENTRY_POLITICAL_DATE entryPoliticalDate, t.BIRTHDAY birthday, t.ETHNIC ethnic, t.HOMETOWN hometown, t.DEGREE degree, t.CERNAME cername, t.MARITAL_STATUS maritalStatus, t.IS_ADMIN isAdmin, t.PAY_CARD_NO payCardNo, t.CARD_BANK cardBank, t.CARD_NAME cardName, t.LAST_LONGIN_DATE lastLonginDate, t.WRONG_COUNT wrongCount, t.LOCK_START_DATE lockStartDate, t.OFFICE_ADDRESS officeAddress, t.IS_DRIVER isDriver, t.IS_LEADER isLeader, t.ANSWER answer, t.QUESTION question, t.CREATE_USER createUser, t.CREATE_DATE createDate, t.CREATE_USER_DEPT createUserDept, t.MODIFY_USER modifyUser, t.MODIFY_DATE modifyDate, t.DELETE_FLAG deleteFlag, t.OPEN_CALE openCale, t.IS_CHECK isCheck, t.GROUP_TEL groupTel, d.NAME deptName
FROM toa_sys_user t, tty_sys_department d WHERE t.DEPT_ID = d.ID and t.DELETE_FLAG = 0
and t.DISPLAY_NAME like '%${displayName}%'
and t.OFFICE_TEL like '%${officeTel}%'
and t.GROUP_TEL like '%${groupTel}%'
and t.SEX = #{sex}
and t.MOBILE like '%${mobile}%'
and t.EMAIL like '%${email}%'
and t.ID in
#{primaryKey}
and t.DEPT_ID in (${deptIds})
order by ${orderBy}

SELECT count(t.ID) FROM toa_sys_user t,tty_sys_department d WHERE t.DEPT_ID = d.ID and t.DELETE_FLAG = 0
and t.DISPLAY_NAME like '%${displayName}%'
and t.OFFICE_TEL like '%${officeTel}%'
and t.GROUP_TEL like '%${groupTel}%'
and t.SEX = #{sex}
and t.MOBILE like '%${mobile}%'
and t.EMAIL like '%${email}%'
and ID in
#{primaryKey}
and t.DEPT_ID in (${deptIds})

SELECT t.ID id, t.CODE code, t.DISPLAY_NAME displayName, t.LOGIN_NAME loginName, t.PASSWORD password, t.SEX sex, t.KIND kind, t.DUTY_ID dutyId, t.LEVEL level, t.DEPT_ID deptId, t.STATUS status, t.ENTRY_DATE entryDate, t.LEADER_ID leaderId, t.DEPT_LEADER deptLeader, t.CHARGE_LEADER chargeLeader, t.POLITICAL political, t.CARD_NO cardNo, t.WEIGHT weight, t.ORDER_NO orderNo, t.JOB_TITLE jobTitle, t.PHOTO photo, t.MOBILE mobile, t.OFFICE_TEL officeTel, t.EMAIL email, t.ENTRY_POLITICAL_DATE entryPoliticalDate, t.BIRTHDAY birthday, t.ETHNIC ethnic, t.HOMETOWN hometown, t.DEGREE degree, t.CERNAME cername, t.MARITAL_STATUS maritalStatus, t.IS_ADMIN isAdmin, t.PAY_CARD_NO payCardNo, t.CARD_BANK cardBank, t.CARD_NAME cardName, t.LAST_LONGIN_DATE lastLonginDate, t.WRONG_COUNT wrongCount, t.LOCK_START_DATE lockStartDate, t.OFFICE_ADDRESS officeAddress, t.IS_DRIVER isDriver, t.IS_LEADER isLeader, t.ANSWER answer, t.QUESTION question, t.CREATE_USER createUser, t.CREATE_DATE createDate, t.CREATE_USER_DEPT createUserDept, t.MODIFY_USER modifyUser, t.MODIFY_DATE modifyDate, t.DELETE_FLAG deleteFlag, t.OPEN_CALE openCale, t.IS_CHECK isCheck, t.GROUP_TEL groupTel
FROM
toa_sys_user t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND FIND_IN_SET(t.id,F_SYSUSER_FINDCHILDLIST(#{id})) ORDER BY create_date desc
mapper.update: UPDATE toa_sys_user set PASSWORD = #{password} WHERE ID = #{id}

UPDATE toa_sys_user
CODE = #{code},
DISPLAY_NAME = #{displayName},
LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName},
PASSWORD = #{password},
SEX = #{sex},
KIND = #{kind},
DUTY_ID = #{dutyId},
LEVEL = #{level},
DEPT_ID = #{deptId},
STATUS = #{status},
POLITICAL = #{political},
CARD_NO = #{cardNo},
WEIGHT = #{weight},
ORDER_NO = #{orderNo},
JOB_TITLE = #{jobTitle},
PHOTO = #{photo},
MOBILE = #{mobile},
OFFICE_TEL = #{officeTel},
EMAIL = #{email},
HOMETOWN = #{hometown},
DEGREE = #{degree},
CERNAME = #{cername},
MARITAL_STATUS = #{maritalStatus},
IS_ADMIN = #{isAdmin},
PAY_CARD_NO = #{payCardNo},
CARD_BANK = #{cardBank},
CARD_NAME = #{cardName},
LAST_LONGIN_DATE = #{lastLonginDate},
WRONG_COUNT = #{wrongCount},
LOCK_START_DATE = #{lockStartDate},
OFFICE_ADDRESS = #{officeAddress},
IS_DRIVER = #{isDriver},
IS_LEADER = #{isLeader},
ANSWER = #{answer},
QUESTION = #{question},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
IS_CHECK = #{isCheck},
CREATE_USER_DEPT = #{createUserDept},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser},
OPEN_CALE = #{openCale},
LOCK_TYPE = #{lockType},
GROUP_TEL = #{groupTel},
ETHNIC = #{ethnic}, LEADER_ID = #{leaderId}, DEPT_LEADER = #{deptLeader}, CHARGE_LEADER = #{chargeLeader},
ENTRY_DATE = #{entryDate}, ENTRY_POLITICAL_DATE = #{entryPoliticalDate}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday},
, MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDateNew} where ID = #{id} and MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate}

UPDATE toa_sys_user
CODE = #{code},
DISPLAY_NAME = #{displayName},
LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName},
PASSWORD = #{password},
SEX = #{sex},
KIND = #{kind},
DUTY_ID = #{dutyId},
LEVEL = #{level},
DEPT_ID = #{deptId},
STATUS = #{status},
ENTRY_DATE = #{entryDate},
LEADER_ID = #{leaderId},
DEPT_LEADER = #{deptLeader},
CHARGE_LEADER = #{chargeLeader},
POLITICAL = #{political},
CARD_NO = #{cardNo},
WEIGHT = #{weight},
ORDER_NO = #{orderNo},
JOB_TITLE = #{jobTitle},
PHOTO = #{photo},
MOBILE = #{mobile},
OFFICE_TEL = #{officeTel},
EMAIL = #{email},
ENTRY_POLITICAL_DATE = #{entryPoliticalDate},
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday},
ETHNIC = #{ethnic},
HOMETOWN = #{hometown},
DEGREE = #{degree},
CERNAME = #{cername},
MARITAL_STATUS = #{maritalStatus},
IS_ADMIN = #{isAdmin},
PAY_CARD_NO = #{payCardNo},
CARD_BANK = #{cardBank},
CARD_NAME = #{cardName},
LAST_LONGIN_DATE = #{lastLonginDate},
WRONG_COUNT = #{wrongCount},
LOCK_START_DATE = #{lockStartDate},
OFFICE_ADDRESS = #{officeAddress},
IS_DRIVER = #{isDriver},
IS_LEADER = #{isLeader},
ANSWER = #{answer},
QUESTION = #{question},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
IS_CHECK = #{isCheck},
CREATE_USER_DEPT = #{createUserDept},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser},
OPEN_CALE = #{openCale},
LOCK_TYPE = #{lockType},
GROUP_TEL = #{groupTel},
MODIFY_PWD_FLAG = #{modifyPwdFlag},
THEME = #{theme},
where ID = #{id}

UPDATE toa_sys_user
OFFICE_TEL = #{officeTel},
MARITAL_STATUS = #{maritalStatus},
OFFICE_ADDRESS = #{officeAddress},
EMAIL = #{email},
MOBILE = #{mobile},
HOMETOWN = #{hometown},
DEGREE = #{degree},
ANSWER = #{answer},
QUESTION = #{question},
CARD_NO = #{cardNo},
CARD_BANK = #{cardBank},
CARD_NAME = #{cardName},
PAY_CARD_NO = #{payCardNo},
PHOTO = #{photo},
GROUP_TEL = #{groupTel},
ETHNIC = #{ethnic}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday}, ENTRY_POLITICAL_DATE = #{entryPoliticalDate},
, MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDateNew} where ID = #{id} and MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate}
mapper.select: SELECT t.ID id, t.CODE code, t.DISPLAY_NAME displayName, t.LOGIN_NAME loginName, t.PASSWORD password, t.SEX sex, t.KIND kind, t.DUTY_ID dutyId, t.LEVEL level, t.DEPT_ID deptId, t.STATUS status, t.ENTRY_DATE entryDate, t.LEADER_ID leaderId, t.DEPT_LEADER deptLeader, t.CHARGE_LEADER chargeLeader, t.POLITICAL political, t.CARD_NO cardNo, t.WEIGHT weight, t.ORDER_NO orderNo, t.JOB_TITLE jobTitle, t.PHOTO photo, t.MOBILE mobile, t.OFFICE_TEL officeTel, t.EMAIL email, t.ENTRY_POLITICAL_DATE entryPoliticalDate, t.BIRTHDAY birthday, t.ETHNIC ethnic, t.HOMETOWN hometown, t.DEGREE degree, t.CERNAME cername, t.MARITAL_STATUS maritalStatus, t.IS_ADMIN isAdmin, t.PAY_CARD_NO payCardNo, t.CARD_BANK cardBank, t.CARD_NAME cardName, t.LAST_LONGIN_DATE lastLonginDate, t.WRONG_COUNT wrongCount, t.LOCK_START_DATE lockStartDate, t.OFFICE_ADDRESS officeAddress, t.IS_DRIVER isDriver, t.IS_LEADER isLeader, t.ANSWER answer, t.QUESTION question, t.CREATE_USER createUser, t.CREATE_DATE createDate, t.CREATE_USER_DEPT createUserDept, t.MODIFY_USER modifyUser, t.MODIFY_DATE modifyDate, t.DELETE_FLAG deleteFlag, t.OPEN_CALE openCale, t.GROUP_TEL groupTel, t.IS_CHECK isCheck FROM toa_sys_user t , tty_sys_department d WHERE t.DEPT_ID = d.ID AND t.DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND d.DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND FIND_IN_SET(t.DEPT_ID, F_DEPARTMENT_FINDCHILDLIST (#{deptId}))

SELECT t.ID id FROM toa_sys_user t WHERE t.MOBILE = #{mobile}
AND t.ID != #{id}
